All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    Board
    This is the board for each game of othello.
    BoardConfiguration
    This interface holds the groundwork of BoardConfigurations.
    Client
    Represents a Client for the Othello game.
    ClientHandler
    Represents a Client Handler for the server of the Othello game.
    DefaultConfiguration
    This class represents the default configuration of the board (the initial state of the board).
    FailedConnection
    Thrown to indicate that the client failed to connect to the server.
    FieldNotEmptyException
    Thrown to indicate that a player tries to claim a field that has already been claimed by a player.
    FieldValueStrategy
    This strategy is based on the positional values from the publication ....
    Game
    A representation of a game that can be played on the board.
    GameClient
    A representation of the client of the Othello game.
    GameListener
    A representation of the listener of Othello game.
    GameServer
    A representation of the server for the Othello game.
    IllegalMoveException
    Indicates that a move cannot be made.
    InvalidFieldException
    Thrown to indicate that a called field does not exist on the board or is in some way else invalid.
    InvalidUsername
    Thrown to indicate that the username of the user is not valid.
    LimitingStrategy
    This strategy is based on the premise of giving your opponent the least possible moves, since this may cause you to get more moves.
    Mark
    Represents a mark that can be on the board.
    MiniMaxStrategy
    The minimax strategy looks at n turns in the future to determine what is the best move, assuming the opponent has perfect play.
    MiniMaxStrategy.Node
    A node in the minimax tree.
    NaiveStrategy
    Implementation of a naive strategy, which chooses a random legal move.
    OthelloBoard
    This class is the implementation of the Board.
    OthelloBoard.Direction
    The interface direction is an interface for classes to adhere to.
    OthelloGame
    Represents the Othello (Reversi) Game.
    OthelloTUI
    The main Othello game class.
    Player
    Represents a player in the game.
    Server
    A server that runs in a separate thread.
    StackableStrategy
    Stackable strategies are strategies that can be used one after the other.
    StackStrategy
    The stack strategy is an implementation of other Stackable strategies.
    StartServer
    A main class used to start a GameServer.
    Strategy
    Interface that represents a strategy that can be used to determine a move in the Othello game.
